Job poster
Message
About the job
About the Role
Join Manus AI's core frontend team to build next-generation General AI Agent interfaces. You'll be at the forefront of creating intuitive, user-friendly experiences that make complex AI functionality accessible to everyone.

What You'll Be Working On

üöÄ Cutting-Edge AI Visualization Development
Build intuitive interfaces for AI-powered applications using modern React ecosystem tools and frameworks.

ü§ù Cross-Functional Collaboration
Work closely with product, design, and backend teams in an agile environment, driving rapid iteration cycles based on user feedback and market insights.

üí° Innovative Tool Development
Contribute to the frontend implementation of groundbreaking AI tools while helping drive commercial growth and product adoption.

üéØ User Experience Excellence
Continuously optimize product experiences by transforming complex AI functionality into clean, intuitive interfaces that users love.

Required Qualifications
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
Strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, including data structures and algorithms
Proficiency in modern JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript development
Expertise with React and its ecosystem (Next.js, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS)
Passion for technology with strong attention to code quality and rapid learning abilities
Demonstrated interest in AI products and emerging technologies

Nice to Have
Experience developing AI products (chatbots, agent visualization, conversational interfaces, etc.)
Background in competitive analysis and technical research
Experience shipping user-facing commercial products at scale
Experience with internationalization (i18n) development, including multi-language support, RTL/LTR layout adaptation, and timezone/currency handling
Proficiency in leveraging AI tools to enhance development productivity and workflow efficiency
Active open source contributor with personal projects and technical experimentation
Hands-on experience with Electron desktop application development

What We Offer

Join a team that's shaping the future of AI interaction. You'll work with cutting-edge technology, collaborate with world-class talent, and have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact on how people interact with AI systems.

About Manus AI

Manus is a general AI agent that bridges minds and actions: it doesn't just think, it delivers results. Manus excels at various tasks in work and life, getting everything done while you rest.At Manus AI, we offer a highly collaborative and innovative environment where experts across engineering, research, and business come together to push the boundaries of AI applications. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and making a real impact, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Contact us: recruiting@manus.im
